attributes.action: To make any government legally bound to their manifesto when elected to government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As soon as a government enters government they find a way to abandon most of their pledges and promises to the people who voted for them. I would like to see a change in law to force a government to keep to their manifesto commitments or to face impeachment for deceiving the electorate.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
